org.bytedeco.javacv

Class JavaCVCL

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bytedeco.javacv.JavaCVCL

  • public class JavaCVCL
extends Object
    Author:
    Samuel Audet To make NVIDIA drivers happy, we may need to limit the maximum heap memory size of Java to 1 GB, by defining something like export _JAVA_OPTIONS=-Xmx1G
